title: Chaudhry Fawad grieved over demise of Saleem Safiâ€™s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 18 (APP):Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain has expressed deep
grief over the demise of the mother of senior journalist Saleem Safi.
In a condolence message on Sunday, he prayed to Allah Almighty to rest her soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved family to bear this loss with fortitude.
